response.overview: A suspenseful melodrama in which the schoolgirl (Lubna) whose fiancé is unjustly imprisoned disguises herself as the widow (Nargis) to take revenge on the family that caused this fate. While living with this family, she becomes attached to them and events unfold as she begins to uncover facts she did not know about her fiancé.
response.title: ومشيت طريق الاخطار
